title: Messaging Service
description: This schema defines the Messaging Service entity, such as Kafka and Pulsar.

messagingServiceType.description: Type of messaging service - Kafka or Pulsar.

brokers.description: Multiple bootstrap addresses for Kafka. Single proxy address for Pulsar.

id.description: Unique identifier of this messaging service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this messaging service.

serviceType.description: Type of messaging service such as Kafka or Pulsar...

description.description: Description of a messaging service instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this messaging service. It could be title or label from the source services.

pipelines.description: References to pipelines deployed for this messaging service to extract topic configs and schemas.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this messaging service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
